title: MetadataExporterAppConfig
description: Configuration for the Metadata Exporter Application.

exportRangeConfig.title: Export Range Configuration
exportRangeConfig.description: Configuration for the export range of data.

rangeType.description: Type of range for data export.

interval.description: Interval for the export range, applicable when rangeType is 'DATE_RANGE'.

unit.description: Unit of time for the export range.

tableConfig.title: Configuration for the table to export the data to.
tableConfig.description: Configuration for the table to export the data to.

connectionConfig.description: Connection details for the Metadata Exporter Application.

exportRange.description: Range of data to export. Options are 'ALL' for all data, 'LATEST' for the latest data, or a specific date range.

eventTypes.description: List of event types to export.

backfill.description: Enable backfill for the exporter to process historical data. This will only work on the very first run of the exporter.

tableConfiguration.description: Configuration for the table to export the data to.
